name: Waterboi
abilty description: Q: Water Blast - Deals 100 damage to the target and slows them by 30% for 2 seconds.
W: Water Shield - Grants a shield that absorbs 200 damage for 5 seconds.
E: Water Walk - Increases movement speed by 20% for 4 seconds.
F: Water Passive - Summons a donkey that charges at enemies, dealing 150 damage.
R: Waterfall - Creates a waterfall that heals allies in the area for 50 health per second.
